statements: SELECT * FROM VoterTurnoutReports WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT report_id, age_group, voter_count FROM VoterTurnoutReports WHERE location='New York';
SELECT age_group, location, voter_count FROM VoterTurnoutReports WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY age_group DESC;
SELECT gender, location FROM VoterTurnoutReports WHERE age_group='18-30' ORDER BY voter_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM VoterTurnoutReports WHERE location='California' AND gender='Female' ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM VoterTurnoutReports WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY age_group DESC, voter_count ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT report_id, age_group, gender FROM VoterTurnoutReports WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age_group IN ('18-25', '26-35')
SELECT MAX(voter_count) AS max_voter_count, MIN(voter_count) AS min_voter_count, AVG(voter_count) AS avg_voter_count FROM VoterTurnoutReports WHERE location = 'California'
SELECT age_group, gender, SUM(voter_count) AS total_voters FROM VoterTurnoutReports GROUP BY age_group, gender ORDER BY total_voters DESC
SELECT location, COUNT(DISTINCT age_group) AS unique_age_groups FROM VoterTurnoutReports GROUP BY location HAVING unique_age_groups > 3
SELECT * FROM voter_demographics;
SELECT id, age, location FROM voter_demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT gender, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM voter_demographics GROUP BY gender HAVING total_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM voter_turnout WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT voter_id, MAX(turnout_count) AS max_count FROM voter_turnout GROUP BY voter_id ORDER BY max_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM voter_demographics WHERE age > 18 ORDER BY gender DESC
SELECT id, age, gender FROM voter_demographics WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_voters FROM voter_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT voter_id, SUM(turnout_count) AS total_turnouts FROM voter_turnout GROUP BY voter_id HAVING total_turnouts > 10
SELECT * FROM voter_turnout WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM age_demo WHERE age_group = '18-25'
SELECT id, gender, turnout FROM gender_demo WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY turnout DESC
SELECT location, turnout FROM location_demo WHERE location = 'New York City' LIMIT 10
SELECT id, age_group, turnout FROM age_demo WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5
SELECT * FROM gender_demo ORDER BY gender
SELECT * FROM age_demo WHERE age_group = '18-25' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, gender, SUM(turnout) AS total_turnout FROM gender_demo GROUP BY gender HAVING total_turnout > 100 ORDER BY total_turnout DESC;
SELECT location, AVG(turnout) AS avg_turnout FROM location_demo WHERE turnout > 50 GROUP BY location ORDER BY avg_turnout DESC;

SELECT age_group, gender, location, SUM(turnout) AS total_turnout FROM age_demo JOIN gender_demo ON age_demo.id = gender_demo.id JOIN location_demo ON age_demo.id = location_demo.id GROUP BY age_group, gender, location;

SELECT MAX(turnout) AS max_turnout, MIN(turnout) AS min_turnout, AVG(turnout) AS avg_turnout FROM age_demo UNION SELECT MAX(turnout), MIN(turnout), AVG(turnout) FROM gender_demo UNION SELECT MAX(turnout), MIN(turnout), AVG(turnout) FROM location_demo;
SELECT * FROM age_demographics;
SELECT id, age, report_date FROM gender_demographics;
SELECT location FROM location_demographics WHERE id = 1;
SELECT report_id, total_votes, eligible_voters FROM voter_turnout WHERE report_id = 2021;
SELECT id, gender, report_date FROM gender_demographics ORDER BY gender DESC;
SELECT * FROM age_demographics ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT count(*) AS total_age_groups, avg(age) AS average_age FROM age_demographics GROUP BY report_id HAVING average_age > 30;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM location_demographics GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_reports DESC;
SELECT report_id, SUM(total_votes) AS total_votes FROM voter_turnout GROUP BY report_id HAVING total_votes > 1000;

SELECT gender, AVG(turnout_percentage) AS average_turnout_percentage FROM gender_demographics JOIN voter_turnout ON gender_demographics.report_id = voter_turnout.report_id GROUP BY gender ORDER BY average_turnout_percentage DESC;
SELECT * FROM voter_turnout;
SELECT voter_id, voted FROM voter_turnout WHERE voted = true;
SELECT age_group, number_of_voters FROM age_demographics ORDER BY age_group ASC;
SELECT gender, SUM(number_of_voters) AS total_voters FROM gender_demographics GROUP BY gender;
SELECT location, number_of_voters FROM location_demographics WHERE number_of_voters > 100 ORDER BY number_of_voters DESC;
SELECT age_group, SUM(number_of_voters) AS total_voters FROM age_demographics GROUP BY age_group;
SELECT * FROM gender_demographics ORDER BY number_of_voters DESC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_voters FROM voter_registration GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 100 ORDER BY total_voters DESC;
SELECT voter_id, age_group, gender, location FROM voter_registration JOIN voter_turnout ON voter_registration.voter_id = voter_turnout.voter_id WHERE voted = TRUE;
SELECT gender, AVG(number_of_voters) AS avg_voters FROM gender_demographics GROUP BY gender ORDER BY avg_voters DESC;
